org.restlet.data
Interface RepresentationMetadata

All Superinterfaces:
Data, Element, Metadata
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRepresentation, ChannelRepresentation, CookiesImpl, DefaultRepresentationMetadata, FileRepresentation, FormImpl, InputRepresentation, ObjectRepresentation, OutputRepresentation, ReadableRepresentation, StreamRepresentation, StringRepresentation, TemplateRepresentation, WritableRepresentation
public interface RepresentationMetadata
extends Metadata

Metadata describing a representation. Resources can have multiple representations called variants.

Method Summary

          Returns the character set or null if not applicable.

          Returns the future date when this representation expire.
